recommendations: Diogo Cabral Figueiredo ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of collaborating with Ahana at AB InBev as an EY Consultant on the Third-Party Risk Management (TPRM) capability. Her experience was instrumental in bringing best practices to the table. Ahana is highly reliable and went above and beyond to support regions in building their TPRM capabilities. Her project management skills kept things organised and ensured smooth collaboration across diverse stakeholders.‚Äù

Srini Sethu ‚ÄúAhana worked with me on the Third Party Risk Management implementation at ABInbev. Her key skillsets were cyber risk and vendor management in which she performed risk assessments of ABI vendors. She was impressive with her communication and stakeholder management skills as she was appreciated by teams across various continents. She is definitely a value-addition to any team. I wish her all the luck for her future endeavours.‚Äù
